DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of an investigational drug in adult patients with allergic rhinitis.
DOC.brief_title: An Approved Drug to Study a New Indication for Allergic Rhinitis (0476-327)
DOC.criteria: Japanese males and females with a 2year documented history of seasonal allergic rhinitis symptoms and positive allergy testing (cedar, alder and/or cypress) Patients with druginduced rhinitis or nonallergic rhinitis, or patients who used antihistamine drugs (within 2 weeks) before the start of the observation period
